SamPy.astronomy.stellarMFs.panter¶

SamPy.astronomy.stellarMFs.panter()¶

This function returns Benjamin Panter’s stellar mass function from: http://www.blackwell-synergy.com/doi/pdf/10.1111/j.1365-2966.2007.11909.x It uses the DR3 data with the BC03 models and a Chabrier IMF.

Returns:
